Hi! My name is Yung-Yu.

I obtained my BA degree in Political Science at <a href = "https://www.ntu.edu.tw/english/index.html" target="_blank">National Taiwan University</a> in 2015 and receieved my Master degree in Public Administration at <a href = "https://www.nccu.edu.tw/app/home.php" target="_blank">National Chengchi University</a> in 2019.

I previously worked as a policy analyst in the <a href = "https://www.ly.gov.tw/Engpages/index.aspx" target="_blank">Legislative Yuan (congress of Taiwan)</a> from 2016 to 2017. Currently, I work as a research assitant at <a href = "http://www.econ.sinica.edu.tw/english" target="_blank">Institute of Economics, Academia Sinica</a>.
